PageTitle: description (BGP Flow Specification interface group view)
FuncDef:
The description command configures a description for a BGP Flow Specification interface group.
The undo description command deletes the description configured for a BGP Flow Specification interface group.
By default, no description is configured for a BGP Flow Specification interface group.
ParentView: BGP Flow Specification interface group view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a description for a BGP Flow Specification interface group.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. The string can contain spaces if it is enclosed with double quotation marks (").

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Without a BGP Flow Specification interface group, the traffic filtering rules configured for BGP Flow Specification routes take effect globally, not on a specified interface. If a BGP Flow Specification interface group is configured, the traffic filtering rules configured for BGP Flow Specification routes also take effect on a specified interface. In this manner, traffic can be forwarded based on the rules of the BGP Flow Specification routes on the specified interface.
After a BGP Flow Specification interface group is created using the flow-interface-group command, you can run the description command to configure a description for the group or modify an existing description for easier identification.
